gurmukhi: dys AOr n Bys jwkr; rUp ryK n rwg ]
transliteration: Des Aur Na Bhes Jaakar Roop Rekh Na Raag||
translation: Thou art Countryless, Garbless, Formless, Lineless and Non-attached.

gurmukhi: j`qR q`qR idsw ivsw; huie PYilE Anurwg ]80]
transliteration: Jattra Tattra Disaa Visaa Hue Phailio Anuraag||80||
translation: Thou art present in all direction and conners and Pervadest the Universe as Love.80.

gurmukhi: nwm kwm ibhIn pyKq; Dwm hUM nih jwih ]
transliteration: Naam Kaam Biboon Pekhat Dhaam Hoon Nah(i) Jaah(i)||
translation: Thou appearest without name and desire, thou hast no particular Abode.

gurmukhi: srb mwn srb`qR mwn; sdYv mwnq qwih ]
transliteration: Sarab Maan Sarbattra Maan Sadaiv Maanat Taah(i)||
translation: Thou, being worshipped by all, art the Enjoyer of all.

gurmukhi: eyk mUriq Anyk drsn; kIn rUp Anyk ]
transliteration: Ek Moondat(i) Anek Darsan Koon Roop Anek||
translation: Thou, the One Entity, appearest as Many creating innumerable forms.

gurmukhi: Kyl Kyl AKyl Kyln; AMq ko iPr eyk ]81]
transliteration: Khel Khel Akhel Khelan Ant Ko Phir(i) Ek||81||
translation: After playing the world-drama, when Thou wilt stop the play, Thou wilt be the same One again.81.

gurmukhi: dyv Byv n jwnhI; ijh byd Aaur kqyb ]
transliteration: Dev Bhev Na Jaan-hoo Jih Bed Aur Kateb||
translation: The gods and the Scriptures of Hindus and Muslims do not know Thy secret.

gurmukhi: rUp rMg n jwiq pwiq; su jwneI ikh jyb ]
transliteration: Roop Ran Na Jaat(i) Paat(i) Su Jaanaoo Kinh Jeb||
translation: How to know Thee when thou art Formless, Colourless, Casteless and without lineage?

gurmukhi: qwq mwq n jwq jwkir; jnm mrn ibhIn ]
transliteration: Taat Maat Na Jaat Jaakar Janam Maran Bihoon||
translation: Thou art without father and mother and art casteless, Thou art without births and deaths.

gurmukhi: c`k® b`k® iPrY c`qR c`k; mwnhI pur qIn ]82]
transliteration: Chakkra Bakkra Phirai Chatur Chakk Maan-hoo Pur Toon||82||
translation: Thou movest fast like the disc in all the four directions and art worshipped by the three worlds. 82.

gurmukhi: lok caudh ky ibKY; jg jwpeI ijh jwp ]
transliteration: Lok Chaudah Ke Bikhai Jag Jaap-hoo Jinh Jaap||
translation: The Name is recited in the fourteen divisions of the universe.

gurmukhi: Awid dyv Anwid mUriq; QwipE sBY ijh Qwp ]
transliteration: Aadh Dev Anaadh Moondat(i) Thaapio Sabai Jinh Thaap(i)||
translation: Thou, the Primal God, art Eternal Entity and hast created the entire universe.

gurmukhi: prm rUp punIq mUriq; pUrn purKu Apwr ]
transliteration: Param Roop Pouneet Moondat(i) Pooran Purakh Apaar||
translation: Thou, the holiest Entity, art of Supreme Form, Thou art Bondless, Perfect Purusha.

gurmukhi: srb ibsÍ ricE suXMBv; gVn BMjnhwr ]83]
transliteration: Sarab Bisva Rachio Suyanbhav Gadan Bhanjanhaar||83||
translation: Thou, the Self-Existent, Creator and Destroyer, hast crated the whole universe.83.
